alert.note: Alert for Western Greene (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 8:37PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Greene County through 915 PM EDT... At 837 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Windham, or near Hunter, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Hunter, Windham, Ashland, Jewett, South Durham, Durso Corner, Hensonville, East Durham, Jewett Center, Maplecrest, Beecher Corners, Sunside, North Settlement, Cornwallville, West Jewett, South Jewett, Brooksburg, O`hara Corners, East Windham and Hervey Street. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
